gurmukhi: ਜੳੁ ਲੳੁ ਕਰਿ ਕਾਮਨਾ ਕਾਮਾਰਥੀ ਕਰਮ ਕੀਨੇ ਪੂਰਨ ਮਨੋਰਥ ਭੲਿਓ ਨ ਕਾਹੂ ਕਾਮ ਕੋ
transliteration: Jau Lau Kari Kaamanaa Kaamaaradee Karam Keenay , Pooran Manorad Bhaiao N Kaahoo Kaam Ko ?
translation: So long as a human being performed deeds to fulfill his desires or with some aim in mind, neither his performed actions achieved anything nor any of his resolutions bore fruit.

gurmukhi: ਜੳੁ ਲੳੁ ਕਰਿ ਅਾਸਾ ਅਾਸਵੰਤ ਹੁੲਿ ਅਾਸਰੋ ਗਹਿਓ ਬਹਿਓ ਫਿਰਿਓ ਠੳੁਰ ਪਾੲਿਓ ਨ ਬਿਸ੍ਰਾਮ ਕੋ
transliteration: Jau Lau Kari Aasaa Aasavant Hui Aasaro Gahiao , Bahiao Dhiriao Tthaur Paaiao N Bisraam Ko ?
translation: So long a human being remained dependent on others for fulfillment of his desires, he wandered from pillar to post without respite from anywhere.

gurmukhi: ਜੳੁ ਲੳੁ ਮਮਤਾ ਮਮਤ ਮੂੰਡ ਬੋਝ ਲੀਨੋ ਦੀਨੋ ਡੰਡ ਖੰਡ ਖੰਡ ਖੇਮ ਠਾਮ ਠਾਮ ਕੋ
transliteration: Jau Lau Mamataa Mamat Moond Bojh Leeno , Deeno Dand Khand Khand Khaym Tthaam Tthaam Ko ?
translation: So long a human being carried the load of I, my, me and yours under the influence of attachment with worldly goods and relations, he kept roving in distress from one place to the other.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰ ੳੁਪਦੇਸ ਨਿਹਕਾਮ ਅੳੁ ਨਿਰਾਸ ਭੲੇ ਨਿਮ੍ਰਤਾ ਸਹਜ ਸੁਖ ਨਿਜ ਪਦ ਨਾਮ ਕੋ ॥੪੨੮॥
transliteration: Gur Oupadays Nihakaam Au Niraas Bhaay , Nimrataa Sahaj Soukh Nij Pad Naam Ko ?428?
translation: One can become unattached and free from all worldly allurements only by taking the refuge of the True Guru and practicing His sermon of Naam Simran that helps one achieve spiritual high, comfort of equipoise and humility.  (428)
